Eligible patient follow : ( 1 ) definite acute ischemic stroke ; ( 2 ) neurological deficit : 4 ≤ NIHSS ≤ 10 ; ( 3 ) time onset drug treatment : within 48 hour . Patients clopidogrel-aspirin group receive 300mg load dose clopidogrel , follow clopidogrel 75 mg/d aspirin 75 mg/d day 2 day 14 , follow clopidogrel 75 mg/d aspirin 100 mg/d day 15 day 90 . Patients aspirin-alone group receive 100-300 mg aspirin day 1 day 14 , follow aspirin 100 mg/d day 15 day 90 .
